oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Nonlinear Behavior in High-Intensity Discharge Lamps
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Baumann, Bernd
Schwieger, Jörg
Wolff, Marcus
Manders, Freddy
Suijker, Jos
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Physics - Computational Physics
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The light flicker problem of high intensity discharge lamps is studied numerically and experimentally. It is shown that in some respects the systems behaves very similar to the forced Duffing oscillator with a softening spring. In particular, the jump phenomenon and hysteresis are observed in the simulations and in the experiments.
